seo.title: Professional Cleaning Services for Individuals and Businesses
seo.introduction: Discover our premium cleaning services in Quebec City. Our team of qualified professionals uses eco-friendly products and innovative techniques to ensure exceptional results. Whether for your home, office, business, clinic, school, or warehouse, we offer customized solutions tailored to your specific needs.

house.title: House Cleaning
house.description: Give your home complete care for a clean, healthy, and welcoming environment.
house.why: Use of eco-friendly and hypoallergenic products. Services adapted to your specific needs.

office.title: Office Cleaning
office.description: A clean workspace improves productivity and reflects your company's professionalism.
office.why: Service available outside office hours. Reduced disease risk through thorough disinfection.

commercial.title: Commercial Cleaning
commercial.description: Create a pleasant experience for your customers with clean and welcoming premises.
commercial.why: Meticulous work meeting hygiene and safety standards. Flexible scheduling to avoid disrupting your business.

clinic.title: Medical Facility Cleaning
clinic.description: Ensure a sterile and secure environment for your patients and staff.
clinic.why: Use of certified products for medical environments. Staff trained in specific cleaning protocols for medical facilities.

school.title: School Cleaning
school.description: A clean environment promotes learning and student well-being.
school.why: Services scheduled outside class hours. Dedicated team respecting school safety standards.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Cleaning
warehouse.description: Maintain a clean and organized storage space for efficient management.
warehouse.why: Compliance with industrial environment safety standards. Flexibility to meet your specific business requirements.

About.title: About Us

whoWeAre.title: Who are we?
whoWeAre.description: Welcome to Clean Place! We are a company specialized in housekeeping, dedicated to making your environment cleaner, healthier, and more pleasant. Since our creation, we have been committed to providing high-quality cleaning services tailored to your needs.

ourHistory.title: Our History
ourHistory.description: Founded in 2015, Clean Place started as a small family business with a simple goal: to provide reliable and affordable cleaning services. Today, we are proud to serve a diverse clientele, from private residences to professional offices, while maintaining our commitment to excellence.

missionValues.title: Our Mission and Values
missionValues.description: Our mission is to provide exceptional cleaning service that exceeds our clients' expectations. We believe in the importance of trust, quality, and respect for the environment. That's why we use eco-friendly products to protect your health and that of the planet.

uniqueFeatures.title: What Makes Us Unique
uniqueFeatures.subtitle: Discover what makes the difference with Clean Place

ecological.title: Eco-Friendly Products
ecological.description: We care for your health and the environment by using only certified eco-friendly products.

experienced.title: Experienced Team
experienced.description: Our qualified and friendly team is fully trained for your peace of mind.

flexible.title: Service Flexibility
flexible.description: We adapt to your specific needs and offer personalized solutions.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
satisfaction.description: Your satisfaction is our absolute priority. We won't be satisfied until you are.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover a range of services tailored to your needs

home.title: Home
home.description: Deep cleaning of your residence for a healthy and pleasant environment.

office.description: Ensure a professional image with regular cleaning of your premises.

clinic.description: Provide a healthy and safe environment for your patients and employees.

About.take: Make an appointment now to discuss it..

1.text: Exceptional service! The team is professional and thorough. I highly recommend their services for quality and professionalism.
1.author: Marie Lambert

2.text: Very satisfied with the service. The staff is punctual and efficient. My house has never been so clean!
2.author: Pierre Dubois

3.text: Impeccable service and very courteous staff. I've been a client for 6 months and wouldn't change for anything.
3.author: Sophie Martin

4.text: Excellent value for money. Customer service is remarkable and results are always consistent.
4.author: Thomas Richard

5.text: An attentive and very professional team. I am fully satisfied with the services.
5.author: Julie Moreau

hero.title: Professional Cleaning Services - Lieu Propre
hero.description: At Lieu Propre, we redefine cleanliness standards with services tailored to your needs: home, office, business, clinics, schools, and warehouses. Trust our expertise for a spotless and healthy environment.

WhyChoose.mainTitle: Why Choose Us for Your Cleaning Needs?
WhyChoose.mainDescription: At Clean Place, we are committed to offering more than just cleaning. With years of experience and a passion for excellence, our team ensures that every corner of your home or office is immaculate.
